sentences.sContent: Was anyone hurt in the accident?
Put that thing down - you might hurt someone with it.
sentences.sCn: 快把那东西放下，你会伤着别人的。

sentences.sContent: I didn’t mean to hurt your feelings.
sentences.sCn: 我不是故意要伤害你的感情。

sentences.sContent: ...Wilson couldn't hurt my father by calling him George; but I hurt him by asking to know why...
...hurt others and require every organisation that uses much energy to rethink how it operates...
...cheating can hurt the reputation of the university and harm those who worked hard for their degree...
...as if their actions "don't count" and don't really hurt anyone...
...Last time I had two weeks’ worth of weight-lifting in three days and I hurt myself...

synos.tran: 使受伤；损害；使疼痛；使痛心
感到疼痛；有坏处；带来痛苦

trans.tranOther: to injure yourself or someone else
